code: function importAll(r){var images={};r.keys().forEach(function(item,index){images[item.replace('./','')]=r(item);});return images;}export function weatherIcon(imageName){var allWeatherIcons=importAll(require.context('../assets/icons',false,/\.(png)$/));var iconsKeys=Object.keys(allWeatherIcons);var iconsValues=Object.values(allWeatherIcons);var iconIndex=iconsKeys.indexOf(imageName);return iconsValues[iconIndex];}
